CECE Course Planning Site

The site is hosted on an Amazon Web Services Lightsail Instance and is not using TTU hardware or network infrastructure; as such users should not store any personal information. Backups are daily.

The contents are intended for the use of CECE Faculty in course planning and development. Authenticated users can directly edit the content files.
